宽容中考  |  话题  |  785字                     
  宽容，是一种美德;宽容，是一种境界;宽容，使彼此的两颗心靠得更近;宽容，使地球的两极融合在一起。宽容，像是一朵盛开的花，芬芳了整个春天;宽容，像是一棵茂密的树，冰凉了整个夏日;宽容，像是一片火红的枫，点燃了整个秋季;宽容，像是一场震撼的雪，寂静了整个冬日。拥有宽容的人，像是拥有了一片海，包容了无数河川;拥有宽容的人，像是拥有了一片天，容纳了无数的鸟儿;拥有宽容的人，像是拥有了一片大漠，簇拥了无数沙砾。宽容，是每个人都需要具备的，宽容，是一种君子的气量，是一种君子般的大度。三国时，诸葛亮与周瑜上演了“三气”的故事。他们约定谁先攻下南郡，南郡就归谁，结果诸葛亮趁周瑜在费尽心思思考怎样攻城时，就趁其不备攻下了南郡，这是第一气。第二气就是着名的：周郎妙计安天下，赔了夫人又折兵。他本想用美人计留下刘备，可被诸葛亮发觉了，用计策将刘备夫妇接了回来，又在船头大声地讽刺周郎。第三气是因为周郎运用“借途灭虢”，他想取荆州，但却假说先取汉中，想趁机擒住刘备，但最后还是被诸葛亮发现了。最后，因为计谋屡次被诸葛亮识破，大病一场，不久便去世了，死前仰天长啸：“既生瑜，何生亮?”周瑜最后是被气死的，他从小文武双全，就是缺少一种胸襟，一种气量。在这个世界上，既然找不到两片相同的树叶，那就更没有两个相同的人，每个人都有着他们各自的性格、追求、习惯、特长，每个人都有他们自己的生活方式、处事方法、思维习惯。所以，在人与人之间产生一些分歧是正常的，只要我们有一颗宽容的心，体谅、尊重、理解他人，就可以获得一种快乐，一种享受，一种惬意。宽容是高山，能容下鲜花，也能容下荆棘;能容下参天大树，也能容下一棵纤细的小草;宽容是丝丝春雨，能融化坚固的冰层，敲醒沉睡的爱心;宽容是萧萧秋风，能吹散自卑的阴云，唤回迷失的良知。宽容是涵养，是理解，是关怀体贴，宽容是给予，是奉献，是新月一弯，是彩霞一片。

Tolerance is a virtue; tolerance is a realm; tolerance brings two hearts closer; tolerance fuses the two poles of the earth. Tolerance is like a blooming flower, fragrant throughout the spring; tolerance is like a lush tree, cooling the whole summer; tolerance is like a fiery maple, igniting the entire autumn; tolerance is like a shocking snow, silencing the whole winter. Those who have tolerance are like having an ocean, accommodating countless rivers; those who have tolerance are like having a sky, containing countless birds; those who have tolerance are like having a vast desert, embracing countless grains of sand. Tolerance is something everyone needs to possess, tolerance is a gentleman's magnanimity, a gentleman's generosity. In the Three Kingdoms period, Zhuge Liang and Zhou Yu staged the story of "Three Angers". They agreed that whoever conquered Nanjiang first, Nanjiang would belong to him. As a result, Zhuge Liang took advantage of Zhou Yu's painstaking thinking about how to attack the city and captured Nanjiang without his knowledge, which was the first anger. The second anger was the famous: Zhou Yu's clever plan to pacify the world, losing his wife and troops. He wanted to use the beauty strategy to keep Liu Bei, but was discovered by Zhuge Liang, who used a strategy to bring Liu Bei and his wife back. The third anger was because Zhou Yu used the "borrowing the way to destroy Guo" strategy. He wanted to take Jingzhou, but pretended to first take Hanzhong, wanting to take the opportunity to capture Liu Bei, but was eventually discovered by Zhuge Liang. In the end, because his strategies were repeatedly seen through by Zhuge Liang, he fell seriously ill and died soon after, crying to the sky before his death: "Since Zhuge Liang was born, why was I born?" Zhou Yu was finally killed by his anger. He was proficient in both literature and martial arts, but he lacked a kind of magnanimity, a kind of generosity. In this world, since we can't find two identical leaves, there are even less two identical people. Each person has their own personality, pursuit, habit, and specialty, each person has their own way of living, dealing with things, and thinking habits. Therefore, it is normal for some differences to arise between people. As long as we have a tolerant heart, empathize, respect, and understand others, we can gain a kind of happiness, a kind of enjoyment, a kind of contentment. Tolerance is a high mountain, able to accommodate both flowers and thorns; able to accommodate towering trees and a slender little grass; tolerance is a gentle spring rain, able to melt the solid ice layer and awaken the dormant love; tolerance is a whistling autumn wind, able to disperse the clouds of inferiority and recall the lost conscience. Tolerance is cultivation, understanding, and caring; tolerance is giving, dedication, a crescent moon, a colorful sunset.
